original_title: 水曜日のカンパネラ 日本武道館公演〜八角宇宙〜
overview: This is the first video work that captures Wednesday's Campanella's first Nippon Budokan solo concert held on March 8 this year. The complete 24 songs from the opening song "Chohatsukai" to "Dracula," performed as an encore, are included!
title: Wednesday Campanella Nippon Budokan ~Octagon Universe~
